summary: Adds a spell to the game named \"Strip\".  This does what you\'d think, targets hit by the spell will be stripped of all clothing (and weapons).
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION:
Adds a spell to the game named \"Strip\".  For each person hit by the spell, the spell may or may not work.  If it works, the person will unequip all clothes, keeping shields, weapons and spells.  

CONDITIONS:
Whether the spell succeeds depends on:
	1. Target disposition (friend, enemy, etc)
	2. Target condition (dead, in combat, etc)
	3. Caster Alteration skill
	4. Caster / Target level disparity
	5. Whether target detects caster (sneak)
	6. Target health (targets near death are less able to resist)

OBTAINING THE SPELL:
A particular follower of Dibella will give you the necessary spell tome if you show
interest.  If you don\'t want to search around, read the comments for this mod, I give the answer there.

5,585 Downloads and 46 Endorsements; If you like the mod please endorse it so others will find it as well!  Since I have it flagged as adult it is harder for people to find.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
My Other Mods:
Sanctuary Cleanup - Unlimited Torture Victims
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11743

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Version History:
v 0.4
        -Added a spell tome that teaches the spell.  

v 0.3
        -No stripping children  
	-Stripped characters keep weapons/shields equipped
	-Added conditional evaluation  

v 0.2 
	-First working release  
	-Strips everything from anyone 

Thanks Bethesda for the game.
Thanks Caliente for making this spell worth it!
author: Anon1Anon
